Name: Havanatheone
Ingredients: 60 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
10 ml Honey syrup (3 parts honey to 1 water by weight)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: A flavoursome Daiquiri featuring honey, apple and mint.
History: Adapted from a recipe discovered in 2003 at Hush in London, England.
